title: Convert Skills & Services page into Skills page with updated content

acceptanceCriteria: The Skills page no longer renders any 'Services Offered' heading, services list, or service descriptions.
Under 'Core Skills', a 'Programming Languages' subsection displays a bullet list with exactly: Java, Python, C, Dart, JavaScript.
A 'Projects Built' section displays the four projects: Mini Amazon (Java), Mini Tally (Java), Mini Calculator (C), Period Tracker (Dart).
An 'Extra Skills' section displays: Poet, Writer.
All user-facing text on this page is in English.

requirements.text: Change the Skills page heading text from "Skills & Services" to "Skills" in `frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/SkillsServicesPage.tsx`, and remove 'Services' from any related page labeling used for navigation/table of contents by updating the title in `frontend/src/features/portfolio/portfolioPages.tsx` from "Skills & Services" to "Skills".

quotes: also remove the services from the page heading make it just skills page

acceptanceCriteria: The page H2 heading displays "Skills" (not "Skills & Services").
The Table of Contents / navigation label for the skills page displays "Skills" (not "Skills & Services").

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
nonGoals: Do not add backend (Motoko) changes; this request is frontend content/label updates only.
Do not add new pages or change the book navigation behavior beyond updating the skills page title/content.
